mapper.select: select ho.hostNo, ho.usersNo, us.name, us.hp, us.path, ho.zipcode, ho.adress1, ho.adress2, ho.adress3, ho.intro, ho.asking, ho.hostcost, co.reviewcount, ho.hostview from users us, host ho, (select count(review) reviewcount from booking where hostNo = #{hostNo}) co where hostNo = #{hostNo} and us.usersNo = ho.usersNo
select hk.hostNo, ke.keywordName from hostkeyword hk, keyword ke where hk.keywordNo = ke.keywordNo and hk.hostNo = #{hostNo} order by ke.keywordno asc

select rt.rn, rt.bookingNo, rt.usersNo, rt.name, rt.path, rt.review, rt.reviewDate from (select rownum rn, ot.bookingNo, ot.usersNo, ot.name, ot.path, ot.review, ot.reviewDate from (select bo.bookingNo, us.usersno, us.name, us.path, bo.review, to_char(bo.reviewDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reviewDate from booking bo, users us where bo.usersNo = us.usersNo and bo.hostNo = #{hostNo} and bo.status = '시팅완료' order by bo.reviewdate desc )ot )rt where rn >= #{startRnum} and rn <= #{endRnum}
select hostNo, hostprofilepath saveName from hostprofile where hostNo = #{hostNo}
select bo.checkin, bo.checkout, us.name guestName from booking bo, users us where hostNo = #{hostNo} and bo.usersNo = us.usersNo
select keywordNo, keywordName from keyword order by keywordNo asc
select bookingNo, hostNo, to_char(checkin, 'YYYY-MM-DD') checkin, to_char(checkout, 'YYYY-MM-DD') checkout, ea, bookingDate, days, note from booking where bookingNo = #{bookingNo}

select s.today ableDate from (select to_char (firstday + level - 1, 'yyyy-mm-dd') today from (select sysdate firstday from dual) connect by firstday + level - 1 <= trunc(sysdate+30)) s where not s.today in (select abledate from able where hostNo= #{hostNo}) order by s.today asc

select to_char(checkin, 'yyyy-mm-dd') checkin, to_char(checkout, 'yyyy-mm-dd') checkout from booking where hostNo = #{hostNo} and status in('예약완료', '펫시팅중', '시팅완료') and checkin > sysdate and checkout > sysdate
mapper.insert:
select seq_host_no.nextval from dual
insert into host values(#{hostNo}, #{usersNo}, #{zipcode}, #{adress1}, #{adress2}, #{adress3}, 0, 0, #{intro}, #{asking}, #{hostcost}, 0)
insert into booking values(seq_booking_no.nextval, #{hostNo}, #{usersNo}, #{checkin}, #{checkout}, #{ea}, #{bookingDate}, #{days}, #{note}, '승인대기', null, null, null, null, null, null, null)
mapper.update: update host set zipcode = #{zipcode}, adress1 = #{adress1}, adress2 = #{adress2}, adress3 = #{adress3}, intro = #{intro}, asking = #{asking}, hostcost = #{hostcost} where hostNo = #{hostNo}
